title: Did U.S. Rep. Omar Say Al-Qaida Makes Her ‘Proud’?
subtitle: U.S. President Donald Trump has made a number of incendiary remarks attacking Ilhan Omar and other congressional members of the so-called "Squad."
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: U.S. Democratic Rep. Ilhan Omar said the terrorist group al-Qaida makes her "proud."
